meanings.definition: Relieve (a person or animal) of the symptoms of a disease or condition.
meanings.sent1: The medicine helped cure his headache quickly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors work hard to cure illnesses and help people feel better.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion promised to cure all ailments, even a broken heart.
meanings.sent4: Laughter has the power to cure the soul, like a healing balm.
meanings.sent5: Her positive attitude seemed to cure any problem that came her way.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that cures a disease or condition.
meanings.sent1: The new drug was hailed as a miracle cure for the virus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are constantly researching new cures for various illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The potion in the storybook was a cure-all for any trouble the characters faced.
meanings.sent4: Hope can be a cure for despair, shining like a beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The ancient remedy was believed to be the ultimate cure for any ailment.
